REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1970 reute d f BC-M/A-COM-<MAI>-WINS-FO 04-03 0047

TEXT.TITLE: M/A-COM <MAI> WINS FORD <F> CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: M/A-Com Inc said it won a major contract from Ford Motor Co to provide a corporate switching network. The value of the contract, awarded to M/A-Com's telecommunications unit in Germantown, Md., was not disclosed. Reuter
